The 6-digit validation code is provided to COVID-19 positive individuals during traditional contact tracing if the individual has COVID Alert PA and is willing to accept the code. Please visit https://www.health.pa.gov/topics/disease/coronavirus/Pages/COVID-Alert-FAQs.aspx to learn more.

I see quite a few people claiming this app doesn't need location tracking to be on, yet it's asked me twice to turn on location tracking to use exposure notifications, since I installed it 5 minutes ago. So which is it?!? What will this app actually tell me if I have my location turned off, anything??
replyContent: COVID Alert PA has no access to location data. On phones with Android 6.0 to 10, the Exposure Notification System (ENS) uses Bluetooth scanning, and the location setting needs to be turned on for all apps for it to work. On Android 11, ENS doesn't need the Location setting to be on. Visit https://www.pa.gov/covid/covid-alert-pa/ for more info.

content: Tried this app for less than few weeks or so, often question of how it can actually sense if I have been exposed to someone tested positive covid 19 just by bluetooth and location services ? replyContent: Hello, the app does not rely on WiFi or cellular data to anonymously determine how close you were to other users and for how long. However, in order to receive exposure alerts, the app does need WiFi or cellular data for at least part of the day. For more info, visit https://www.health.pa.gov/topics/disease/coronavirus/Pages/COVID-Alert-FAQs.aspx.

replyContent: Hello, COVID Alert PA has no access to any location data. Google prevents apps using their Exposure Notification System (ENS) from being published to the play store if they attempt to use location data. On Android version 11, the ENS does not require the phone's Location setting to be on. We suggest you check and update your Android version.

Great approach to contact tracing. Help stop the spread. Install and set it up and you're good to go.
Thank you. Another tool for us to help fight this terrible virus.
Thank you for this..
Horrible performance. Drains your battery.
replyContent: We are sorry to hear that COVID Alert PA is draining your phone battery. Please reach out to us at ra-dh-CovidApp@pa.gov and tell us more about the phone device you are using so we can investigate your issue.

content: This DOES *NOT* use friends lists, contact lists, GPS, physical tracking, or ANY PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION. What this DOES use is near-range Bluetooth beacon scanning, so if someone else has the app and you pass them, their UNIDENTIFIABLE "id" gets tagged by you, and if their medical professional/PCP/etc positively tests them for COVID-19, it will alert those whose tokens were saved. It's effectively the 3DS's Street Pass lol. AGAIN IT DOES NOT USE OR REQUIRE CONTACTS OR PRIVATE INFORMATION. Help be safe, help others be safe.
I think it should breakdown where the percentage of those reporting with some symptoms show relatively where in the state they are located
This app does NOT use your contact or friend lists
Use it people

Please install this app and spread the word! The more people use it, the more effective it is, and the faster we can all return to some semblance of normalcy. And just to be clear regarding privacy -- not only does this app NOT use your location, it actually doesn't request ANY permissions from your device. It only uses Bluetooth to determine if you have been in close contact with someone who tested positive and also has the app installed.
replyContent: We appreciate your positive feedback. Thank you for using the COVID Alert PA app and adding your phone to the COVID-19 fight!

content: Make this common knowledge, please! Everyone should use this app.
A great use of technology to help in the fight against COVID-19. App is well designed. A "good job" to PA, and to Apple/Google for cooperating on exposure notification.

This is great, and I really trust Google's protection of my privacy. This will really help stop the spread of Covid through early detection and prevention. Everyone should download it and keep their data up-to-date!
Functions perfectly. Could be very helpful if everyone downloads it.
